title: Athletism — Polo (Elite) — Phase 6: Reactive Agility & Defensive Skills
equipment: Swimming pool (deep water, water polo goals, balls, caps)
Dryland: gym (rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, kettlebells)
goal: Improve reaction, lateral movement, and defensive positioning.

warmup: Water drills: sculling, vertical kick easy 5'
main: Water: 12x10m reactive sprints to coach call
Reaction lights on deck: 10x20'' shuffle cues
